creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
When you switch the language on the search results page, the results are lost,
i.e. a blank page is displayed.

We could either preserve the request parameters when building the language
switching links, or we could show a search form instead of the blank page.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Another option would be to attach the search parameters to the session.
Now the search form is displayed. IMO this is good enough for the moment.
creator: andreas@apache.org
